name: Instant Pot® Quick and Easy Outlaw Chili Beans
author: bd.weld
summary: These chili beans are delicious and so easy to make. Dinner is ready in 45 minutes or less! If your chili doesn't have beans it's not outlaw chili. Garnish with lime, cilantro, diced onions, Cheddar cheese, and diced avocado.
ingredients: 1 (29 ounce) can pinto beans, rinsed and drained
2 (4 ounce) cans diced green chiles, undrained
1 tablespoon chile-garlic sauce (such as Huy Fong Foods®), or to taste
directions: Turn on a multi-cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and the select Saute function
Coat the bottom of the pot with oil
Cook beef until browned, about 5 minutes
Cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes
Add chili beans, pinto beans, tomato sauce, green chiles, chili powder, cider vinegar, chile-garlic sauce, oregano, and cumin
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 10 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes
